credit_line: Gift of Mabel Nast Crawford and Cyril Nast
title: Every Voter Shall Have an Office and Be Pensioned
medium: pen and ink on illustration board
inscriptions: l.l. in ink: Th:Nast./ 1889; verso u.c. in ink: Pledges made and Pledges broken.; verso l.c. ink: That's the Kind of Slippery Hill he is./ Up one side and down the other.
